segments.text: The kitchen feels alive with activity, yet the woman seems so serene, so unbothered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I marvel at how she can be so fixated on that plate while chaos brews behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already soaked, and she still doesn’t react to the puddle forming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she could feel the tension in the air, the risk that looms just a step away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical to think she’s so oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is almost defying gravity as he reaches for the cookie jar, and I hold my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for the girl; she’s so excited, ready to claim her prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t shake the feeling that something will go wrong any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Will they ever learn that some things come with a risk?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself torn between laughter and dread as I witness this unfolding drama.
segments.speaker: PAR
